verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O pavanulaaraa meedu vishwasampu punaadi Yenthentho stiramainadi shrestampu vaakya maa kandamu nitchun shri Yesu naashrayinchu shri Yesu naashrayinchu thannashrayinchuvaare dhanyulu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee ketti vipathu sambhavimpagaanu ne neetho nunnaanu bhaya metiki devudan ne nee konarthun saayam naa goppa shakhti thonu naa goppa shakhti thonu naa goppa shakhti thonu ninnilpudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devaagni pareekshalu neeku kalgagaanu krupaa shakhti mendugaa neekithunu aa manta ninnu naavarimpa gaanu neeloni kalmashambu neeloni kalmashambu neeloni kalmashambu dahinchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vrudhapyamu nandu swantha prajalella naa maarani prema ruchi chooturu praayamun proddu grunkunatti velan ne kougilinthu vaarin ne kougilinthu vaarin ne kougilinthu vaarin naa kougitan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa yandu viswaasa munchu natti yaatman ne vidvanu shatru koti chetikin paataala mellan vani mringa joodan ne nellavelalandu ne nellavelalandu Ne nellvelalandu rakshintunu{/lang-eng}
